mapper.select: SELECT d.departmentName,sublist.abolitionSubject,s.name abolitionSubjectName,ssg.grade FROM substitution_subject_list sublist LEFT JOIN student_subject_grade ssg ON sublist.abolitionSubject = ssg.subjectId LEFT JOIN subject s ON sublist.abolitionSubject = s.id LEFT JOIN grade g ON ssg.grade = g.gradeLevel LEFT JOIN department d ON sublist.departmentId = d.id WHERE (g.score BETWEEN 1.1 AND 2.5) AND ssg.id= #{userNumber}

SELECT DISTINCT substitution.id substitutionSubject, sublist.abolitionSubject, s.name abolitionSubjectName, substitution.name substitutionSubjectName, d.departmentName FROM substitution_subject_list sublist LEFT JOIN subject s ON sublist.abolitionSubject = s.id LEFT JOIN major_list major ON sublist.abolitionSubject = major.majorSubjectId LEFT JOIN department d ON major.departmentId = d.id RIGHT JOIN major_list majorList ON major.departmentId = majorList.departmentId LEFT JOIN subject substitution ON majorList.majorSubjectId = substitution.id WHERE sublist.abolitionSubject = #{subjectId} AND substitution.completeType = '전공선택' AND majorList.majorSubjectId NOT IN (SELECT abolitionSubject from substitution_subject_list)

SELECT d.departmentName, sub1.name abolitionSubjectName, sub2.name substitutionSubjectName FROM student_substitution_subject sss LEFT JOIN substitution_subject_list list ON sss.abolitionCode = list.abolitionSubject LEFT JOIN department d ON list.departmentId = d.id LEFT JOIN student s ON sss.studentId = s.id LEFT JOIN subject sub1 ON sss.abolitionCode = sub1.id LEFT JOIN subject sub2 ON sss.substitutionCode = sub2.id WHERE sss.studentId= #{userNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM student_subject_grade WHERE id=#{userNumber} AND subjectId=#{abolitionId}
